title: Can someone give me a basic rundown of all the  good/decent 4800 IP junglers?
body:
Pros/cons, basic description. Example:
(Insert champ name here)
pros:
good ganks
good mobility

cons:
bad dueling potential 

Thanks!

replies.body:
Graves is a good champion
Pros: 
Easy ganks
Good mobility with his E which is a dash
Good clear early game

Cons: 
Not the strongest if a jungler like lee sin that wants to invade you.

Nocturne:
Pros: 
Can be built tanky or damage
excellent ganks, every 100 seconds or so (ult)
Great dueler

Cons:
Blows all his spells on one ult, isn't great if you can't stick to the champ you ulted
low mobility, other than ult
ult has really fricking long cd
----
Cho'gath
Pros:
Can be built extreme tank, or split damage
really good ganks, if you can land his q
Excellent true damage execute

Cons:
Crap mobility
long cd
q is really hard to land
----

Personally, I play nocturne, and some cho'gath to keep things interesting

Volibear
Pros:tanky tons of damage, good ult once u get tank.lots of pick potential. Passive broken
Cons cc easily and kited easily,
Graves:Tons of damage, tank stats not including health with his e, amazing kiting, good aoe ult, and decent ganking potential
Cons:squishy af and cc easily
Hecraim 
REALLY GOOD EARLY GAME PRESSURE,awesome ganking at level 3
Cons:still kinda squishy and can be cc easily.
Sejuani
Pros:really good cc and tank stats and can make awesome plays with ur ult
Cons can be kited easily and no mobility  but her dash.

Best our of all of those are hec and voli. But all of them are good
welcome anything to help a fellow rose icon :D
